revised_title: Chemical Constitution of Narcotine and Its Products of Decomposition: Part III
tldr: The author investigates the chemical composition of narcotine and its products of decomposition. Two new bases derived from narcotine are prepared: normal narcotine (nornarcotine) and dimethyl-normal-narcotine (dimethyl-nor-narcotine). The properties and reactions of these bases are compared to other narcotine bases, and neither of the new bases has significant physiological effects.
